CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 2, 1955, pg. 5 reads: "New Firemen, fire captain, police lieutenant - Four new firemen, a fire captain, and a police lieutenant to replace ex-Lieut. James Robertson were sworn in at City Hall Monday. The new fire captain, Donald G. Hoffman, is shown next to Fire Chief Stephen Adley at the extreme left.  Next to him are the new hosemen-laddermen, Edmund C. Miles, 1 Amanda Street; James P. Wessell, 555 Greenfield Avenue; Thomas C. Allen, 841 Whiteside Road; and Samuel Polito, 322 Jacksonia Street.  The new police lieutenant, who was formerly Detective Joseph W. O'Mara, 612 Chess Street, stands next to David Olbum, director of public safety, and Superintendent James Slusser who are at the exereme [sic] right. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Donald G. Hoffman, Stephen Adley, Edmund C. Miles, James P. Wessell, Thomas C. Allen, and Samuel Polito, Joseph W. O'Mara, David Olbum, and James Slusser, standing in Pittsburgh City Council Chambers at the City County Building
